|wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=none |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2527L;SiGe, 2527L, 7157G;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=mobilerouter |default_ssid_regex=^mobilerouter$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:6B |oui_eth=00:02:6B }} "GP100 REV:0.2" and "P/N:65000-001" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
All default settings are per the FCC manual. :The sample SSID noted is '''mobilerouter'''. It's presumed to be used.
A MAC label affixed to the EUT has a 00:02:6B ('''BCM''') OUI. Again, it's presumed to be used.
==Presumed used PSU(s)== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a '''Ktec''' KSAC0500200W1US.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand=Ktec |model=KSAC0500200W1US |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.4 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50/60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=5 |output_a=2 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |manuf_country=China |style=large, vertical }}
